ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16.3 ounce) package refrigerated buttermilk biscuit dough, separated and each portion cut into quarters
1 ¼ cups shredded Cheddar cheese, divided
¾ cup jalapeno pepper slices, divided
¾ teaspoon dried parsley flakes, divided

cookingTips: Layer biscuit pieces alternately with cheese and jalapenos for even flavor distribution
Don't worry about precision; this is a rustic, fun bread meant to be pulled apart
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Monkey bread is a fun, interactive appetizer with savory elements. Would you like suggestions for spice level adjustments or additional flavor variations?
